Yggdrasil follows and seats himself on the rather small chair. He was 
not the kind to like games though, so he did not touch the commands.

Yggdrasil: What about you? How did you join up with the others?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Gatara laughs.  "Of course we're not!  Some of us used to be 
> Predacons, some were Maximals - but no longer.  We follow our own 
> rules, march to our own drum."
> 
> She leads her companion into Rogue Star's recreation area.  Gatara 
> plunks herself down at a table with a holo-projector built in for 
> games and the like.  "Have a seat.  It's been a while since I've had 
> a chance to talk with someone from my own weight class."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > The tree-bot follows Gatara with obvious uneasiness. As he's not 
> sure 
> > how they consider him and how he'll be treated, he decides to try 
> and 
> > figure out who they really are.
> > 
> > Yggdrasil: Outside Cybertron, heh? That's funny, because I thought 
> > Pred merchant were restricted to operate only to some minor 
> > colonies... Unless you mean you guys aren't Preds.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > "You'd be surprised what you can learn by dealing with races 
> outside 
> > > Cybertronian space."  Gatara lets the comment hang as she 
beckons 
> > him 
> > > down a corridor.  "Let's find some place to talk, shall we?"  
> This 
> > is 
> > > about as close to flirting as the croc-bot usually gets.
> > > 
> > > Riekan carries Jayde - who protests all the while that she can 
> walk 
> > > on her own - down a different hall to the med-bay.  Meanwhile, 
> > > Devilcat turns to Noir, Fury, and Torin.  "You three come with 
> me.  
> > > We've got some business to take care of."
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > Yggdarsil was amazed. He was not aware that such technology 
> > > existed, 
> > > > even though there were rumors about the existence of such a 
> ship.
> > > > 
> > > > Yggdrasil: Well I be slagged...
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > > > Devilcat brings the procession to a halt at the top of a low 
> > > hill, 
> > > > > which offers an excellent view of ... nothing.  "We're 
here," 
> he 
> > > > says 
> > > > > simply.  "Computer, stand down security protocols."  On cue, 
> > > Rogue 
> > > > > Star decloaks and lowers its shields, allowing the Rogues 
and 
> > > their 
> > > > > temporary guest to board.
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > > > Yggdrasil: Talos was a tall strong bot. I don't what his 
> beast 
> > > > mode 
> > > > > > was of late, but I don't think it changed him much.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > He follows Devilcat, not from too far, nor too near.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> 
wrote:
> > > > > > > "We have yet to encounter the Maximals on this planet 
> > > directly." 
> > > > > > > Devilcat points out.  Gatara taps him on the shoulder 
and 
> > > > > whispers 
> > > > > > > something to him.  The Rogue commander arches an 
> > > eyebrow.  "But 
> > > > > some 
> > > > > > > of us have seen them in battle, as Gatara tells me.  
> Perhaps 
> > > if 
> > > > > you 
> > > > > > > could describe this Talos fellow, we could help ..."
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > He trails off as the Rogue Star's computer alerts him by 
> > > radio 
> > > > of 
> > > > > a 
> > > > > > > comm signal received in his absence.  "Riekan, bring 
> Jayde 
> > to 
> > > > the 
> > > > > > > CR.  Yggdrasil, under the circumstances, I suggest you 
> come 
> > > with 
> > > > > us 
> > > > > > - 
> > > > > > > we're dangerously close to Predacon territory."
